lists.title: Best Sci-Fi of the 2000s
lists.description: The 2000s saw the rise of visually groundbreaking sci-fi, exploring themes of humanity, artificial intelligence, and futuristic technologies.
posts: ETERNAL SUNSHINE OF THE SPOTLESS MIND

lists.title: Best Sci-Fi of the 2010s
lists.description: The 2010s brought more experimental storytelling, thought-provoking sci-fi narratives, and explorations of identity and existence.

lists.title: Best Sci-Fi of the 2020s
lists.description: The 2020s are defined by sci-fi tales that explore dystopian futures, climate change, and AI's impact on humanity.

lists.title: Best Action of the 2000s
lists.description: The 2000s were a golden era for action films, characterized by intense sequences, larger-than-life heroes, and groundbreaking stunts that set new benchmarks for the genre.

lists.title: Best Action of the 2010s
lists.description: The 2010s brought a new wave of action-packed, character-driven stories featuring intense choreography, stunning visual effects, and emotionally resonant narratives.

lists.title: Best Action of the 2020s
lists.description: In the 2020s, action films have become more daring, blending genres, and offering high-intensity experiences with innovative storytelling techniques.

lists.title: Best Horror of the 2000s
lists.description: The 2000s introduced a wave of psychological and supernatural horror that disturbed and fascinated audiences, setting the stage for future chills.

lists.title: Best Horror of the 2010s
lists.description: The 2010s were a transformative decade for horror, blending psychological tension, social commentary, and unforgettable scares.

lists.title: Best Horror of the 2020s
lists.description: The 2020s have seen a resurgence of horror with more experimental, elevated, and socially relevant narratives.

lists.title: Best Drama of the 2000s
lists.description: The 2000s were a golden era for character-driven dramas, focusing on complex narratives and deep emotional exploration.

lists.title: Best Drama of the 2010s
lists.description: The 2010s featured powerful, introspective dramas that delved into themes of identity, society, and human relationships.

lists.title: Best Drama of the 2020s
lists.description: The 2020s have emphasized social issues, identity, and personal struggles, blending realism with artistic storytelling.
posts: A24'S EVERYTHING EVERYWHERE ALL AT ONCE

lists.title: Best Comedy of the 2000s
lists.description: The 2000s brought hilarious, often absurd comedies that defined the era, blending satire, gross-out humor, and heartfelt storytelling.
posts: HAROLD & KUMAR GO TO WHITE CASTLE

lists.title: Best Comedy of the 2010s
lists.description: The 2010s offered fresh comedic takes on everyday life, societal norms, and personal journeys, blending wit and satire.
posts: WHAT WE DO IN THE SHADOWS

lists.title: Best Comedy of the 2020s
lists.description: The 2020s continue to blend humor with commentary on modern issues, from identity to technology, with absurdity and charm.
posts: BARB AND STAR GO TO VISTA DEL MAR
THE TRAIL OF THE SCREAMING FOREHEAD
SHANG-CHI AND THE LEGEND OF THE TEN RINGS
